message: Starting integration review - reading resource lifecycle analysis and implementation files
Reading update_agent_progress function to verify cleanup integration - checking lines 4289-4500
Verifying deploy_headless_agent for file tracking integration - checking if prompt files are tracked properly
Creating comprehensive integration review report with checklist, gaps, and priorities

Integration review completed - comprehensive report created with checklist, critical gap analysis, priority fixes, and testing strategy. Verified: cleanup_agent_resources exists (3940-4119), kill_real_agent integrated (3878-3883), update_agent_progress MISSING cleanup (4537), file tracking adequate, daemon created. Primary finding: 7-line fix needed for automatic cleanup on completion.
